title: Google\Cloud\Dataplex\V1\GetPartitionRequest
name: GetPartitionRequest
description:
Get metadata partition request.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataplex.v1.GetPartitionRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the partition: projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}/zones/{zone_id}/entities/{entity_id}/partitions/{partition_value_path}. The {partition_value_path} segment consists of an ordered sequence of partition values separated by "/". All values must be provided.
